author: Vivienne Clarke, Paul Cullen
title: Coronavirus: New Garda powers a response to ‘slippage’ on no travel rule
description: Restrictions set to be extended as residents of holiday resorts warn against ‘social sabotage’
content:
Gardaí were given new powers to curtail the movement of people last night due to slippage in terms of compliance with a requirement that people remain within 2kms of their home. 
The Garda Commissioner has sent out regulations which require that people remai… [+4468 chars]
